travelAdvisory.comment: No recent avalanches reported and there is little existing snow. Avalanche risk in the mountains in the North and Eastfjords will increase with new snow this week.
travelAdvisory.highlights: No recent avalanches reported and there is little existing snow. Avalanche risk in the mountains in the North and Eastfjords will increase with new snow this week.

weatherForecast.highlights: Lítilsháttar slydda og snjókoma til fjalla á mánudag og hægur vindur.

avalancheActivity.highlights: There is no existing base layer of snow. On Tuesday snow is expected to start to accumulate in gullies and depressions.

snowpackStructure.highlights: There is no existing base layer of snow. On Tuesday, snow will start to accumulate in gullies and depressions.

travelAdvisory.comment: No recent avalanches reported and there is little existing snow. Avalanche risk in the mountains in the North and Eastfjords will increase with new snow this week.
travelAdvisory.highlights: No recent avalanches reported and there is little existing snow. Avalanche risk in the mountains in the North and Eastfjords will increase with new snow this week.

weatherForecast.highlights: Éljagangur í NA-átt á þriðjudaginn. Rólegt og kalt á miðvikudaginn og fimmtudaginn.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Considerable snow accumulation in gullies and S-SW-facing slopes in snow showers in the coming days. While there is little existing base layer present in the mountains, the new snow can trigger avalanches.

snowpackStructure.highlights: There is little base layer present in the mountains. Snow will accumulate in gullies and S-SW-facing slopes in snow showers during snowfall in strong N-NE winds on Tuesday and Wednesday.

weatherForecast.highlights: Éljagangur í N-NA-átt á þriðjudag og miðvikudag

avalancheActivity.highlights: Considerable snow accumulation in gullies and S-facing slopes in snow showers in the coming days. While there is little existing base layer present in the mountains, the new snow can trigger avalanches.

snowpackStructure.highlights: There is little base layer present in the mountains. Snow will accumulate in gullies and S-facing slopes in snow showers during snowfall in strong N-winds on Tuesday and Wednesday.

travelAdvisory.comment: No recent avalanches reported and there is little existing snow. Avalanche risk in the mountains in the North and Eastfjords will increase with new snow this week.

weatherForecast.highlights: Éljagangur til fjalla í N-átt á þriðjudag og miðvikudag en slydda á láglendi. Rólegt og kalt eftir hádegi á fimmtudag.
